import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addproduct } from '../Redux/productRedux' import './CSS/Sidepanel.css' // import { products } from '../Data' const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle={ //styling fontWeight:600 } const [products,setProducts] = useState([]) const dispatch = useDispatch(); function render(){ setProducts(products.push('WROGN')) dispatch(addproduct({...products})) } return (
FILTERS
{/*styling*/}
BRAND
) } export default Sidepanel
